name: Naked JO
description:
In this fast-paced 2D action platformer, you play as a character with the unique ability to possess any enemy you encounter. Your goal is to navigate through various levels and eliminate all enemies in your path.

To do so, you can use a variety of weapons or simply throw them at your enemies. If you succeed, your enemy will be stunned and drop their weapon, allowing you to pick it up and use it against other foes.

In addition to traditional combat tactics, you can also utilize your explosive powers. When you possess an enemy, you have the ability to detonate them at any time, causing a powerful blast that will stun any enemies within the blast radius.

With each level presenting new challenges and obstacles to overcome, you'll need to master your possession abilities and use them strategically to succeed in your quest. Are you ready to possess and destroy everything in your path?
